stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeaponPower.NAME: Arcane Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for #b
Damage.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentaclesPower.NAME: Black Tentacles
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks with random targets target this enemy for #b
turn.
turns.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliarPower.NAME: Find Familiar
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity

stsjorbsmod:CoilPower.NAME: Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: When you forget #yPatience, deal #b
Damage to all enemies and lose all Coil.

stsjorbsmod:EnergizedCustomPower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
additional [E] next turn.

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationPower.NAME: Prestidigitation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b1 Weak or #b1 Vulnerable to a random enemy #b
time.
times.

stsjorbsmod:SnappedPower.NAME: Snapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember any memories or clarities.

stsjorbsmod:CharityMemoryPower.NAME: Charity
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b!S! #yStrength per #b!G! gold you have.

stsjorbsmod:ChastityMemoryPower.NAME: Chastity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose #b!D! #yDexterity and gain #b!B! #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemoryPower.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, retain #b!M!.

stsjorbsmod:EnvyMemoryPower.NAME: Envy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply #b!M! #yVulnerable to that enemy.

stsjorbsmod:GreedMemoryPower.NAME: Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain #b!M! gold.

stsjorbsmod:GluttonyMemoryPower.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by #b!M!.

stsjorbsmod:HumilityMemoryPower.NAME: Humility
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b!M! #yThorns.

stsjorbsmod:KindnessMemoryPower.NAME: Kindness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b!M! #yPoison.

stsjorbsmod:LustMemoryPower.NAME: Lust
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks deal #b!P!% bonus damage. When you forget Lust, gain #b!W! Weak.

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemoryPower.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yCoil each time you play a card.

stsjorbsmod:PrideMemoryPower.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:SlothMemoryPower.NAME: Sloth
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b
fewer cards each turn.

stsjorbsmod:TemperanceMemoryPower.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce #yStrength of ALL enemies by #b!M!.

stsjorbsmod:WrathMemoryPower.NAME: Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy with an attack card, permanently increase that card's damage by #b!M!.
